channel.title: Comunistando — Feed Geral
channel.description: Breaking News do mundo socialista (feed geral)

item.title: Education, health fees among key concerns
item.description: China to legislate on preschool education

item.title: Education, health fees among key concerns
item.description: China to legislate on preschool education

item.title: International group praises green revival
item.description: A high-level international advisory body applauded China's efforts to improve the environment and suggested a 15-year strategy against pollution in a draft recommendation report on Monday.

item.title: Fuselage Flaws Found on 14 of Russia’s Superjet Airliners
item.description: According to Izvestia, structural elements known as stringers, which reinforce the fuselage, were not properly secured in the section between the cockpit and the passenger door.

item.title: From War Surge to Slump: Is the Russian Economy Heading Toward Recession?
item.description: The Russian economy is still posting GDP growth, but the war-driven boost from heavy budget spending is fading.

item.title: Scroll-Shaped Skyscraper Design Wins Vote to Replace Iconic Novy Arbat Building in Moscow
item.description: The skyscraper will replace the Soviet-era Council for Mutual Economic Assistance building, which was deemed structurally unsound in October.

item.title: Pandilleros en Haití quemaron 22 blindados enviados por EEUU
item.description: Puerto Príncipe, 26 ago (Prensa Latina) La coalición de pandillas que mantiene en jaque a la Policía Nacional de Haití, al Ejército y a las tropas extranjeras quemó hasta hoy a 22 blindados enviados por Estados Unidos. The post Pandilleros en Haití quemaron 22

item.title: Disminuyen 82 por ciento enfermos costarricenses de dengue
item.description: San José, 26 ago (Prensa Latina) Costa Rica redujo en 82 por ciento los casos de dengue en lo que va de año, respecto a igual período de 2024, informó hoy el Ministerio de Salud. The post Disminuyen 82 por ciento enfermos costarricenses de dengue first appeare

item.title: Condenan en Cuba asesinato de periodistas en Gaza
item.description: La Habana, 26 ago (Prensa Latina) El Círculo de Corresponsales de Guerra de la Unión de Periodistas de Cuba (UPEC) condenó hoy el asesinato de cinco periodistas en Gaza, consecuencia del bombardeo del ejército de Israel contra el Hospital Naser. The post Conde

item.title: Peacock Chosen as Symbol of 12th National Games
item.description: (KPL) The Organizing Committee of the 12th National Games has officially adopted the design, logo, mascot, and motto for the upcoming “Vientiane Games 2025.” The committee announced that the lucky animal, the peacock, will serve as the symbol of the event.
